basic_node.title: Emission power level
basic_node.description: Power level of emitted beam, specifically of one laser pulse.
basic_node.references: [re1, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/0-387-25101-4_4, Lidar Equation: System factor K: Average Power of laser pulse P_0; p.6-7.] [re1, https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/8500511/, Laser-Radar-Equation: Emitted luminous power P_0.] [re16, https://linkinghub.elsevier.com/retrieve/pii/S0030401818304632] [re16, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/0-387-25101-4_4, Lidar Equation: System factor K: Average Power of laser pulse P_0; p.6-7.] [re19, http://ascelibrary.org/doi/10.1061/%28ASCE%290733-9453%282005%29131%3A4%28135%29, See blooming.]
